name: fat cat map
summary: ever wonder where your local congressman gets his money?
tech: Google App Engine, Amazon AWS, Layer9, AppTools

future_goal.summary: Show where all the money has gone.
future_goal.description: Show where every dollar has been spent in politics.

tiers.name: Friend
tiers.description: We'll give you an invite to the private beta!

tiers.name: Supporter
tiers.description: Get an FCM Transparency Warrior mug, and an invite to the private beta!

tiers.name: Backer
tiers.description: Get an FCM Transparency Warrior tote bag, and an invite to the private beta!

tiers.name: Sponsor
tiers.description: Get both the Transparency Warrior mug and tote bag, and an invite to the private alpha, a full month before our beta release! We'll also list you publicly on our supporters page!

tiers.name: Investor
tiers.description: Get the mug, tote bag, 5 early alpha invites, and a public listing on our supporters page!

tiers.name: Inner Circle
tiers.description: Wow, you're passionate about transparency! Get all the swag, 10 early alpha invites, public listing on our supporters page, and the ability to give direct feedback that helps shape fatcatmap!

tiers.name: Transparency Warrior
tiers.description: As a critical supporter of the movement, you want to be involved as early and often as possible. Get 50 early alpha invites, public listing, 2x all the swag, and the ability to give direct feedbat that helps shape fatcatmap!

tiers.name: Fat Cat
tiers.description: Get any bill you want passed in Congress. Ha ha, just kidding! You're the kind of supporter that makes transparency possible. Because of supporters like you, the fight for sunlight in Washington has hope. You'll get a free lunch with the development team, all of the above, and as many early alpha/beta invites as you can eat!
